description: Acronym of self-contained underwater breathing apparatus.

entries.meaning: (underwater diving) An apparatus carried by a diver, which includes a tank holding compressed, filtered air and a regulator which delivers the air to the diver at ambient pressure which can be used underwater.

verbs.description: scuba (third-person singular simple present scubas, present participle scubaing, simple past and past participle scubaed)
